text: Robert Joseph Wittman (born February 3, 1959) is an American politician. He has been the U.S. representative for since 2007. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Rob Wittman official U.S. House website * Rob Wittman for Congress * * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. title: Rob Wittman
